name: Mana Fountain
customText: +5 Mana when any player builds a Tower

name: Pulsing Towers
customText: Tower Cards = +1 VP

name: Inexpensive
customText: Build Towers for 1 fewer Gold

name: Perfect Reagent
customText: Build Towers for 1 fewer Reagent

name: Trap
customText: Add a Trap Card to the Dungeon

name: Spell Shield-T
customText: Protected from one negative Spell effect, then placed out of play

name: Miracle
customText: Reverse the Reagents on the Gather and Increase Value sides of your Gather Reagent Card that you playif you choose to

name: Invisibility Potion
customText: Steal 1 Gold per Eye of Newt used in casting the Spell (from one player)

name: Scribe
customText: Take and cast one of the top 5 Spell Cards for free

name: Evolve
customText: One of your Familiars becomes a Wizard of the same school

name: Transmute
customText: Transmute any number of Reagents to Gold at a 2:1 ratio

name: Spell Shield-A
customText: Protected fro one negative Spell effect,then placed out of play

name: Transform
customText: Transform any Reagent to another Reagent at 2:1 ratio before converting to Mana

name: Crystal Ball
customText: Max Hand Size = 5

name: Powerful Helper
customText: When using a Familiar to score, gain +1 Gold/ Wizard and Familiar from its school of magic

name: Master Alchemist
customText: +1 VP/ 2 Gold

name: Energize
customText: Increase the mana value of a Reagent by 3 before converting

name: Potent Servant
customText: Familiar Cards = +1 VP

name: Flame Bolt-D
customText: Destroy any card owned by another player and place it out of play

name: Earthquake
customText: Destroy (out of play) another player's Tower

name: Root Cellar
customText: Store +10 Reagents

name: Maximum Gather
customText: Gather all Reagents shown on the top half of the Gather Reagents Card

name: Mana Garden
customText: +5 Mana whenever you Gather Reagents

name: Obscure
customText: The targeted player may not enter the Dungeon the next time they try

name: Bloom
customText: +1 any Reagent when Gathering

name: Adept Conversion
customText: May convert 2 types of Reagents

name: Divination
customText: Enter the Dungeon as an action without a Familiar

name: Hoard Mana
customText: +1 VP/ 7 Mana at the end of the game

name: Scry Tower
customText: Look at the top 5 cards in the Tower Deck, and get one for free

name: Energy Pulse
customText: Destroy all Spell Shield spell cards currently owned by all players

name: Scry Dungeon
customText: Look at the top 10 cards in the Dungeon deck, and keep all Treasure Cards

name: Scry Wizard
customText: Look at the top 5 cards in the Wizard Deck, and get one for free

name: Disintegrate-S
customText: Disintegrate any card owned by another player and place it out of play

name: Scry Familiar
customText: Look at the top 5 cards in the Familiar Deck, and get one for free

name: Flame Bolt-S
customText: Destory any card owned by another player and place it out of play

name: Rise
customText: Re-activate one of your used Familiar Cards

name: Disintegrate-N
customText: Disintegrate any card owned by another player and place it out of play

name: Undying
customText: +3 VP/ Necromancer Wizard and Familiar Cards owned

name: Block Giant
customText: Giants do not hit, and instead give you 1 Gold

name: Control Undead
customText: Ignore hits from and take any Undead card encountered when Dungeon Delving; +3 VP for each

name: Demonic Possession
customText: Take a Familiar from another player and use it immediately

name: Block Denizens
customText: Denizens do not hit, and instead give you 1 Gold

name: Block Goblin
customText: Goblins do not hit, and instead give you 1 Gold

name: Block Undead
customText: Undead do not hit, and instead give you 1 Gold

name: Treasure
customText: Gain 2 Gold each time you enter the Dungeon

name: Summon Helper
customText: Summon Familiar for 5 fewer Mana Cost

name: Spell Shield-C
customText: Protected from one negative Spell effect,then placed out of play

name: Mana Drain
customText: Steal 15 Mana from another player

name: Creation
customText: Take any available Card for free

name: Energy Circle
customText: +5 Mana when any player summons a Familiar

name: Spirit Shield
customText: Ignore one additional hit per Dungeon Expedition

name: Order of the Wand
customText: Wizard Cards = +2 VP

name: Charm

customText: Gain 2 Gold/ Card of any School of Magic of your choice

customText: Remove (out of play) the top 5 cards of any deck

name: Secret Society
customText: May hide your Wizard Cards; Any negative Spell aimed at your Wizards affects a random Wizard of yours

name: Haste
customText: Take a bonus action

customText: Protected from one negative Spell effect, then placed out of play
